value.title: LOOK: In Covid-19 world, robots could be just what the doctor ordered
value.excerpt: The worldwide health crisis has added urgency to the question of how to bring robotics into the public health equation.

value.title: AI researchers create testing tool to find bugs in NLP from Amazon, Google, and Microsoft
value.excerpt: A testing tool called CheckList found mistakes in commercially available AI from Amazon, Google, and Microsoft; CheckList won Best Paper award at ACL.

value.title: Elon Musk says full self-driving Tesla tech 'very close'

value.title: This 12-year-old CEO is offering free coding, AI classes during COVID-19
